items.text: drives on the up, seeing as there's room for him to free the arms, but cover moves to his right and stops it well
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, no run

items.text: beats him with a 140 kph delivery that pitches on a good length, tempts the airy-fairy drive, and nibbles away just enough to make the batsman look silly
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, no run

items.text: gorgeous shot! He seems adept at pulling these off. The ball is climbing on him. It almost seems like it gathers pace off the pitch. But who cares about all that. Markram gets his body beside it, gets up on his toes so he's on top of the bounce and clatters it between point and cover.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, FOUR runs

items.text: on the other side now, through midwicket, Very measured from Markram, responding to the bowler moving round the wicket with a simple dink through a yawning gap
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, FOUR runs

items.text: blocks a full delivery outside off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, no run

items.text: half an appeal for lbw as de Kock plays for turn but the good length ball from round the wicket just goes on with the arm. Might have slide down leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: works off the back foot, trying to flick the flatter delivery through midwicket. Doesn't even go past the pitch
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: low full toss outside leg, he flicks it to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: cuts the ball even though it's coming into off stump, hunting it almost. No run to point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: full on off stump, drives to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, 1 run

items.text: pushes a length ball to short midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Markram, no run

items.text: length ball on middle and leg, works this to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to de Kock, 1 run

items.text: punches straight to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, no run

items.text: run out missed! A direct hit at the bowler's end by Mahmudullah from mid-off and Markram would've been walking back. Wasn't even in the frame. Markram was deep inside the crease as he punched, took off instinctively for a run. So much risk for one run. Ain't worth it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, 1 run

items.text: appeal for lbw but de Kock may have been saved by an inside edge. Looks to work this full delivery on the stumps through midwicket, better off playing straight. Replays confirm the angle was taking the ball down leg too, even if there wasn't an inside-edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to de Kock, no run

items.text: hits this straight to mid-off, off the thick inside edge. Excellent control from Mustafizur. Top, top bowling. Pressure building.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to de Kock, 1 run

items.text: edged and four! No first slip. He would've lapped this up. Runs away to the third man boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Markram, FOUR runs

items.text: eased to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, 1 run

items.preText: Coming back to the final delivery of the seventh over: it was a cutter, gripped the surface and held on, forcing Markram to check-punch.
items.text: works this down to long-on as they jog the single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Markram, 1 run

items.preText: Slip comes out to short mid-off for QDK
items.text: dabs down to short third man
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: rocks back and cuts but hits it straight to point. That's a boundary ball not taken toll of
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, no run

items.text: pristine drive to cover point, a misfield gives them a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to de Kock, 1 run

items.text: flatter one on middle and leg, punched to deep midwicket
items.postText:
Akash: "Remember SA is the team who chased 435 comfortably against the current world cup champion (Australia) in the era where 250 was considered as a decent score. Bangladesh needs to bowl very well even though they are defending a huge total of 331." -- Not one person from that squad is playing here though. And also, as you mentioned, a different era, different venue.

Mohammad Saifuddin into the attack
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Markram, 1 run

items.text: mistimes this cut to cover. This one also held on to the surface
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Markram, no run

items.text: shot of the afternoon! Too short, he stands tall and punches this between cover and point.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Markram, FOUR runs
